abstract: Co-founders of Sidecar app announce end to ride-hailing and delivery service after struggling against bigger competitors Uber and Lyft.
lead_paragraph: Sidecar, a delivery and ride-hailing pioneer that has struggled to compete with bigger rivals like Uber and Lyft, said it would stop offering services.

headline.main: Sidecar, a Pioneer of Ride-Hailing, to Stop Services
headline.print_headline: A Pioneer of Ride-Hailing, Sidecar to Stop Services

snippet: Sidecar, a delivery and ride-hailing pioneer that has struggled to compete with bigger rivals like Uber and Lyft, said it would stop offering services.
